description: Infosys is a global leader in consulting and technology services, known for its innovative solutions and commitment to excellence.
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is a leading IT services and consulting company, delivering cutting-edge solutions to clients worldwide.
Amazon India is the Indian subsidiary of the global e-commerce giant, offering a wide range of products and services to Indian consumers.
Wipro Limited is a leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company, known for its commitment to sustainability and social responsibility.
Hindustan Times is one of India's largest English-language newspapers, delivering news and information to a diverse readership.
Flipkart is a leading Indian e-commerce marketplace, offering a wide range of products and services to online shoppers.
HCL Technologies is a global IT services and consulting company, providing innovative solutions to enterprises across various industries.
Tech Mahindra is a leading provider of digital transformation, consulting, and business re-engineering services.
MakeMyTrip is India's leading online travel company, offering a wide range of travel services and products.
Accenture is a global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy, consulting, digital, technology, and operations.
Adobe India is a subsidiary of Adobe Inc., a multinational software company known for its creativity and multimedia software products.
IBM India is the Indian subsidiary of IBM, a global technology and consulting company, providing a wide range of products and services.
Apple India is the Indian arm of Apple Inc., a multinational technology company known for its iconic hardware, software, and consumer electronics.
Oracle India is the Indian subsidiary of Oracle Corporation, a global technology company specializing in database management systems and cloud services.
Reliance Industries Limited is a diversified conglomerate with interests in petrochemicals, refining, oil, and gas exploration, telecommunications, and retail.
Google India is the Indian subsidiary of Google, a multinational technology company known for its search engine, online advertising technologies, and various internet-related services.
Cisco India is the Indian arm of Cisco Systems, a global technology company that designs, manufactures, and sells networking equipment and services.
Bajaj Finserv is a financial services company in India, providing a range of financial products and services, including loans, insurance, and investment.
ITC Limited is a diversified conglomerate in India with businesses spanning fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG), hotels, paperboards, and packaging.
ICICI Bank is a leading private sector bank in India, offering a wide range of banking and financial products and services to its customers.
Vodafone Idea Limited is one of India's largest telecommunications service providers, offering a range of mobile and internet services.
Reliance Jio Infocomm Limited, commonly known as Jio, is a telecommunications company in India, providing 4G LTE services, and more recently, 5G services.
Mahindra & Mahindra is a leading Indian multinational automobile manufacturer, producing a wide range of vehicles, from two-wheelers to heavy trucks.
Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) is a global technology company providing IT solutions, software, and hardware products for businesses.
Axis Bank is a private sector bank in India, offering a range of financial products and services, including retail banking, corporate banking, and more.
Microsoft India is the Indian subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation, a multinational technology company known for its software, hardware, and other technology products.
Walmart Labs is the technology arm of Walmart, focused on developing innovative solutions and technologies to enhance the retail experience.
Deloitte India is the Indian arm of Deloitte, a global professional services firm providing audit, tax, consulting, and advisory services.
Netflix is a streaming giant that revolutionized the entertainment industry, providing a vast library of content to a global audience.
